column4: hi, im just about to try out 6.10.. im running a AMD 64 X2 Dual Core 4200, should i run the AMD64 version or the i386 version. is performance increased? are their just as many 64bit packages as i386?

I've tried the amd64 and i386 of 6.06 and really, the amd64 is brilliant if you want to do server stuff..but I had problems with it with some applications, and some older apps didn'thave 64bit support at all..for a server I'd go with 64bit in a second.. for a desktop..not quite yet
oh one thing though, with the i386 edition, I had to install the -smp enabled kernel for it to notice my dual core processor
it didn't for 6.06 dapper, hopefully it does auto install the smp one for edgy
